title: Clear night city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a city street at night with multiple braking events.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to ensure safety on the city streets at night. It slows down and brakes frequently to avoid collisions with other vehicles or pedestrians. The ego vehicle is also following the traffic rules and regulations, including stopping at red lights and yielding to pedestrians at crosswalks.
